Learn how to integrate with backend APIs: Learn how to integrate with backend APIs using generated OpenAPI SDKs for type-safe API calls.
This guide explains how to connect front: This guide explains how to connect frontend applications to MBC CQRS Serverless backends using auto-generated TypeScript SDKs. Type-safe API integration catches errors at compile time and provides excellent developer experience with autocomplete.
